Articles.Content:
Hello Everyone! in this challenge you just need to try a mun landing, but you don\'t have to land.

make a video of a landing that has gone wrong for some reasons.

rules;

1. the fail MUST be unintentional

2. every mod is permitted

bad luck to everyone! =P (bad luck so you can explode while landing while filming)

The only part of this that seems to be a challenge is hitting F1 in time to capture anything that goes wrong.

This being Kerbal Space Program, Stuff Blowing Up is not an uncommon occurrance.

you\'re right, but who\'s better at failing?

p.s. I think that a screenshot can\'t show the attempt, if you want to try you should make a video so you can record the entire landing
Well, if only I wasn\'t in the map view. I had a large explosion (in space) due to a structural failure between an engine and a decoupler.

I\'ve tried making countless Deep Space Rescue Ships to rescue 2 stranded kerbals orbiting the sun on an ecliptic orbit that lasts about 2 and a half years and about 4 times my mechjeb unmanned pod has exploded in deep space due to overheating, quite funny to be floating around one second the BOOM! No ship left >.> Crashed a rescue pod on minmus aswell then had fun running around eva trying to push a few bits of the craft back closer together
This was going to put a big lander on the Mun...

If screenshots are acceptable....

Blasted Mun-hills.

This was going to put a big lander on the Mun...

Enter my photo shoot competition

'Hey Munny, is that our engine over there?'

'I don\'t know, let me go check.'

Also I have a picture of a rocket falling at 500 m/s 2 km from the Munar surface at full throttle. You can picture what happened there.

I just did my first ever trip to the mun (I am SO awesome! ). Though my rocket happened to have a few construction mistakes. Which forced poor Ronsel to make an emergency EVA right before landing.

This pic is from a couple of minutes later when he was inspecting the remaining parts.
